Monique Bennett-Lowe

Maryland/DC Metro Area · mbennettlowe@gmail.com

Full-Stack JavaScript Developer who works with a range of languages and software such as databases, Typescript, Unit Testing and API's to develop and deploy applications. I offer valuable problem-solving skills in the world of web, application, and software development. I’m a team player and work well in a collaborative space but can work independently to bring a project to completion. I am committed and eager to learn new software development technologies and to learn them quickly.

I also formed a successful Full-Stack Development study group for aspiring female software developers who are looking to advance their careers in tech through group study and a supportive community. As the facilitator, I'm tasked with creating lesson plans, planning group Portfolio projects, responding to questions, organizing code reviews, and running consistent meetup engagement opportunities.

Here's a short blog detailing my steps to completing the AWS Cloud Resume ChallengeAWS Cloud Resume Challenge
